title: Exxon Flash Game by Asen Sokolov

generalInfo:
ExxonMobil, the largest publicly traded international oil and gas company, uses technology and innovation to help meet the world’s growing energy needs. Exxon hold an industry-leading inventory of resources and are one of the world’s largest integrated refiners, marketers of petroleum products and chemical manufacturers.

Over the last 125 years ExxonMobil has evolved from a regional marketer of kerosene to the largest publicly traded energy company in the world.
typographyDescr: Helvetica is a widely used sans-serif typeface. Over the years a wide range of variants have been released in different weights, widths and sizes, as well as matching designs for a range of non-Latin alphabets.
creativeDescr:
PROJECT ASSIGNMENT: Design and develop an engaging game which offers users to learn curious facts

PROJECT IMPLEMENTATION: An addictive, easy to play game called Valve Solve was created and developed. It challenged users observations skills and made them solve tasks with different levels of difficulty. To promote the game we created rich-media banners that were spread over different digital channels.

PROJECT DEVELOPED BY: XEC-STUDIO
